description: Creates a new job or updates an existing job in the specified subscription.

resource_group_name.description: The resource group name uniquely identifies the resource group within the user subscription.

api_version.description: Specifies the API version to use for this request.

body.description: The parameters used for creating the job

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the job should be created

job_name.description: The name of the import/export job.

subscription_id.description: The subscription ID for the Azure user.

accept_language.description: Specifies the preferred language for the response.

x_ms_client_tenant_id.description: The tenant ID of the client making the request.

tags.description: Specifies the tags that will be assigned to the job.
